text: Bradley Whitford (born October 10, 1959 in Madison, Wisconsin) is an American actor. He has played White House Deputy Chief of Staff Josh Lyman on the NBC television drama The West Wing, Danny Tripp on Studio 60 on the Sunset Strip, Dan Stark in the Fox police buddy-comedy The Good Guys, Timothy Carter in the CBS series The Mentalist, and Eric Gordon in the movie Billy Madison. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Bradley Whitford and Jane Kaczmarek File for Divorce on the People website * 2004 Commencement Speech at the University of Wisconsin * Satirical, tongue-in-cheek, mock 2004 (actually anti-)Bush campaign ad on YouTube * Some of Whitford's public service & political ad videos * 2001 NPR Interview * 2002 Interview (MoreMusic104) Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television producers Category:Writers from Madison, Wisconsin Category:Actors from Madison, Wisconsin Category:HuffPost writers and columnists Category:Movie producers from Wisconsin
title: Bradley Whitford
